author: PTI
title: Actor, singer and Broadway star Aaron Tveit tests positive for coronavirus
description: The actor is known for ‘Moulin Rouge! The Musical’ on Broadway, as well as a recurring role in ‘Gossip Girl’
content:
Actor, singer and Broadway star Aaron Tveit has tested positive for COVID-19. The 36-year-old actor, who took to social media to share his diagnosis, said he is feeling much better now.
